      • getConnectionSimilarity

        protected <E extends Edge> double getConnectionSimilarity(Graph<E> graph,
                                              int keystone,
                                              int impost1,
                                              int impost2)
        Description copied from class: LinkClustering
        Computes the similarity of the two edges as the Jaccard index of the neighbors of two impost nodes. The impost nodes are the two nodes the edges do not have in common. Subclasses may override this method to define a new method for computing edge similarity.

        Implementation Note: Subclasses that wish to override this behavior should be aware that this method is likely to be called by multiple threads and therefor should make provisions to be thread safe. In addition, this method may be called more than once per edge pair if the similarity matrix is being computed on-the-fly.

        Overrides:
        getConnectionSimilarity in class LinkClustering
        Returns:
        the similarity of the edges.a
